arts.ttl: Real Madrid 4-4 Real Sociedad (agg 5-4): Los Blancos overturn two-goal deficit to reach Copa del Rey final
arts.sum: Real Madrid, will play either Barcelona or Atletico Madrid in next month’s Copa del Rey final in Seville next month

arts.ttl: Real Madrid (5)4-4(4) Real Sociedad: Highlights, man of the match, stats as Los Blancos survive major scare to reach Copa del Rey final
arts.sum: Real Madrid survive a major scare to seal their place in the Copa del Rey final with a dramatic 5-4 aggregate victory over Real Sociedad.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid needs extra time to oust Real Sociedad and advance to Copa del Rey final
arts.sum: Madrid had won the first leg 1-0 in February, but Sociedad took the second leg 4-3 after Mikel Oyarzabal scored in stoppage time in regulation, when both teams scored twice after the 80th minute. Real Madrid needed extra time to get past Real Sociedad and reach its second Copa del Rey final in three seasons on Tuesday.

arts.ttl: WATCH: Real Madrid back ahead on aggregate as Endrick Felipe scores against Real Sociedad
arts.sum: Real Madrid saw their first leg advantage wiped out early on against Real Sociedad, but they are now back ahead on aggregate in their Copa del Rey semi-final tie.
